metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30629 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Permissions in Google Chrome prior to 93.0.4577.82allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
